name: Glycol Benzylcarbamate
source: Karthikeyan M.; Glen R.C.; Bender A. General melting point prediction based on a diverse compound dataset and artificial neural networks. J. Chem. Inf. Model.; 2005; 45(3); 581-4471
Reason: 1,2-propanediol base, with a melting point around 50 degrees Celsius, based on the fact that 1,2-propanediol itself has a melting point around that value. The methoxy group introduces additional hydrogen bonding potential, estimated at around +5 degrees Celsius. The benzene ring introduces additional rigidity, estimated at around +10 degrees Celsius. The carbamate group introduces additional hydrogen bonding potential, estimated at around +5 degrees Celsius. The methoxy group introduces additional hydrogen bonding potential, estimated at around +5 degrees Celsius.
